mapper.update: update qaboard set subject=#{subject}, content=#{content} where no=#{no}
mapper.select: select commno,mcode,mwriter,mcontent,mregdate from qaboardcomm where mcode=#{mcode} order by 1 desc

mapper.select: select mcode from qaboardcomm where commno=#{commno}
